description: Common material used to craft weapon.
name: Iron Ore

description: Regular wood, could be found in forest.
name: Wood

description: Craft book once below to a Leprechaun, many part of it was lost.
name: Alice's craft book

description:
A durable hide from a common wolf. Valued for its toughness, 
it’s often used in crafting sturdy armor and clothing.
name: Wolf skin

description:
A mystical white wolf with snow-like fur, believed to bring good fortune to those 
who encounter it.
name: White Wolf skin

description:
Once worn by the mighty Siegfried, the Ring of Nibelungen is a symbol of both power and tragedy.
By owning this ring, Fariy mass will be automaticlly attart to you.
name: Ring of Nibelungen

description:
An ancient tome said to contain the knowledge and spells of the legendary wizard Merlin.
The Grimoire can collect fairy essence near by.
name: Grimoire of Merlin

description:
The final arrow shot by the legendary Robin Hood, said to mark the spot of his grave.
This arrow enable you to see treasure others can't see.
name: Arrow of Robin

description: A sharp fang from a fierce wolf, known for its strength and ferocity.
name: Wolf Fang

description: A book written by a hunter, fulled with knowladge of wolf.
name: Hunter's note

description:
Sweet wine made with Luby's secret recipe.
Speed up the charge rate of TP.
name: Sweet wine

description:
Mandrake is a common plant found in forests, known for its slight toxicity, 
but in small doses, it can be used as a stimulant.
name: Mandrake

description:
The Glass Lily is a translucent plant found in forests, known for its 
beauty and mild restorative properties in small doses.
name: Glass Lily

description:
Dracaena is a tropical plant known for its striking foliage and air-purifying qualities,
providing a mild mana restoration when consumed.
name: Dracaena

description:
Intivat is a rare, vibrant herb found in mystical groves, 
known for its potent potion-boosting properties when brewed into a potion.
name: Intivat

description:
Luby's secret recipe is a closely guarded culinary treasure that allows players 
to craft powerful potions,combining unique spices for enhanced effects.
name: Luby's secrate recipe

description:
A rare, shimmering potion distilled from forest dew, known to quietly
mend wounds and restore vitality to those who partake in it.
name: Sylvan Dewdrop
note:
<recipe>

Material1: Item 1, 1
Material2: Item 20, 1

Requirement: Item 21
Cost:50
</recipe>

description:
Wine infused with rare blossoms, offering a gentle 
restoration of one's magical essence with each sip.
name: Fae Blossom Brew
note:
<recipe>
Result: Item 23
Material1: Item 2, 1
Material2: Item 20, 1
Description:Potion that restore more mana.
Requirement: Item 21
Cost:50
</recipe>

description:
A flexible yet durable material shed by snakes, often used in crafting 
lightweight armor or exotic accessories.
name: Snake Hide

description:
Once owned by a powerful dwarf, this enchanted bag possesses the extraordinary
ability to transform matter into various forms.
name: Rumpelstiltskin's bag

description: A orb from blood wolf, throw it into the fireplace may reveal something.
name: Rust orb

description:
A common herb found in swampy areas, with its potent roots containing a 
substance capable of neutralizing even the deadliest poisons.
name: Verdant Whisper

description:
A letter from Ateias to his brother, warnning him regarding his status.
At end there is few recipe regarding snakes.
name: Ateias's letter

description:
Medicine popular among adventurers, known for its effectiveness 
against most poisons.
name: Venom Purge
note:

</recipe>

description: Poisonous snake teeth that still contain traces of venom.
name: Snake Teeth

description:
The scales shimmer in shades of green, gold, and black, reflecting 
light in mesmerizing patterns.
name: Serpent Scale

description:
A volatile mix of snake teeth and stimulants that 
boosts TP but poisons the user shortly after use.
name: Venomous Brew
note:
<recipe>

Material1: Item 16, 1

Description:A volatile mix of snake teeth and stimulants
Requirement: Item 30

</recipe>

description:
A drop of blood said to contain the power of a legendary 
serpent with an ancient bloodline tracing back to the hydra.
name: Hydra blood

description: Boar hide is a rugged and durable material sourced from the tough skin of wild boars.
name: Boar hide

description:
The tusk of a boar is a formidable and striking feature, 
characterized by its long, curved shape and sharp edge.
name: Tusk

description:
Bear skin is a robust and luxurious material derived from the hide 
of bears, known for its thickness and warmth.
name: Bear skin

description: A letter from Atias to his brother, requesting some material for craft.
name: Ateias's Material list

description:
A book fulled with wisdom of ancient, some said it's the grace from
Hephaestus。
name: Ateias's Craft book

description:
The key to Belania's dungeon—its castle was once the beginning 
of a romantic story, but now only horror remains.
name: Cell Keys

description:
A fragment from the stone guardians of Belania, unnaturally hard and far 
tougher than ordinary stone.
name: Cursed Stone Shard

description:
The heart of Belania's stone guardians, radiating an eerie power and 
possessing an unyielding hardness far beyond ordinary stone.
name: Cursed Stone Core

description:
A chess piece shaped like a king, it whispers a tale of tragedy—the curse of a prince 
turned beast by a witch's envy of his beauty.
name: Black King Piece

description:
A chess piece shaped like a queen, it tells of a beast's desperate search for 
true love, but who would listen to the words of such a monstrous creature?
name: Black Queen Piece

description:
A chess piece shaped like a bishop, it reveals the story of a monster who used 
wealth to lure women into marriage, only to be betrayed once they took his gold.
name: Black Bishop Piece

description:
A chess piece shaped like a knight, it speaks of a castle guarded by living furniture—once 
humble servants, now transformed into guardians.
name: Black Knight Piece

description:
A chess piece shaped like a rook, it echoes the tale of a cursed castle once filled 
with glory and honor, now abandoned to decay and ruin.
name: Black Rook Piece

description:
A chess piece shaped like a pawn, it whispers of a living castle ruled by a beast, 
where riches and glory await—but at what cost?
name: Black Pawn Piece

description:
A chess piece shaped like a king, it tells of a curse undone by true love, 
freeing the prince from his monstrous form.
name: White King Piece

description:
A chess piece shaped like a queen, it speaks of a girl whose kindness and love 
shattered a curse and restored a beast to humanity.
name: White Queen Piece

description:
A chess piece shaped like a bishop, it whispers a tale of the girl who saw past 
the beast’s vile exterior and offered her heart in exchange for his humanity.
name: White Bishop Piece

description:
A chess piece shaped like a knight, it whispers of a merchant spared by the 
castle’s master, who stole a forbidden rose and now faces the consequences.
name: White Knight Piece

description:
A chess piece shaped like a pawn, it echoes the story of a prince and a girl 
who lived happily ever after—yet, what lies ahead when the story ends?
name: White Pawn Piece

description:
A chess piece shaped like a rook, it speaks of a castle once full of magic 
and glory, now powered not by curse, but by the enduring force of love.
name: White Rook Piece

description:
A shattered chess piece, its fragments pulse with a restless energy, whispering 
of agility and swift movements once unmatched.
name: Break Knight Piece

description:
A fractured chess piece, its remnants radiate an unyielding force, echoing the 
strength and resilience it once embodied.
name: Break Rook Piece

description:
A broken chess piece, seemingly fragile, yet brimming with boundless potential 
and untold possibilities.
name: Break Pawn Piece

description:
A shattered chess piece, radiating an aura of mystic power, its fragments pulsating 
with arcane energy.
name: Break Bishop Piece

description:
A pulsating crystal heart that whispers of enduring love; press it to your 
ear, and you may hear the echo of a devotion that banished all misfortune.
name: Heart of Light

description:
A shadowy core that roars of eternal loneliness; when held, it radiates 
an unshakable chill, as if grasping the void itself.
name: Core of Darkness

description:
The final work of Dvergar, a renowned smith; within its pages lie clues 
to the castle's fate and recipes that may aid you on your journey.
name: Diary of the Fallen

description:
The pieces themselves hold power, and if we gather the broken fragments, 
we might be able to transform our weapons with their dark energy.
name: Ritual of Chess

description:
A rare blossom at the heart of Bellania Castle, said to bestow 
fortune and eternal love upon its true-hearted wearer.
name: Peach Blossom
